Frequently Asked Questions

What does your typical engagement look like?‚ñº

We start with a discovery call to understand your needs, followed by a detailed assessment of your current operations. We then create a customized automation roadmap and work with you to implement solutions that drive measurable results.

How long does it take to see results?‚ñº

Most clients see initial results within the first 4-6 weeks of engagement. Significant ROI is typically realized within 3-6 months depending on the complexity of the automation initiatives.

Do you work with all types of startups?‚ñº

We specialize in working with growth-stage startups and VCs. Whether you're pre-seed, seed-stage, or Series A/B, we have solutions tailored to your specific needs and constraints.

What automation tools do you work with?‚ñº

We're platform-agnostic and work with tools like Zapier, Make (Integromat), n8n, and custom API integrations. We assess your current tech stack and recommend the best solutions for your situation.

Can you help with data migration?‚ñº

Yes! We handle data migration, system integrations, and ensure smooth transitions from manual processes to automated workflows.

What if we need ongoing support?‚ñº

We offer fractional ongoing support, retainer agreements, and strategic consulting to help you scale your automated systems as your business grows.
